import React from "react"; import { FaLinkedinIn, FaRegEnvelope, FaGithub, FaStackOverflow } from "react-icons/fa"; const Banner = () => { const [state] = React.useState({ title: "Hi, I'm Kiran Muppana", subtitle: "Infra Developer@Amdocs || NITC'21", text: "I creat applications using trending technologies and, love exploring cloud and ML related articles.​", image: "/portfolio/images/symbiote-2.png", }); return (

{state.title}

{state.subtitle}

{state.text}

); }; export default Banner;
